Authors:
Monika Chandani Dayarathne, Dhanushka Nadeeshan Wanasinghe,
E.B. Gareth Jones, Kevin D Hyde, Putarak Chomnunti
Title:
A novel marine genus, Halobyssothecium (Lentitheciaceae) and
epitypification of Halobyssothecium obiones comb. nov.
Keywords:
new genus, marine fungi, Passeriniella, Leptosphaeria,
Phylogeny, Spartina, Taxonomy
Abstract:
A novel marine genus, Halobyssothecium (Lentitheciaceae)
is introduced to accommodate Byssothecium obiones (= Halobyssothecium
obiones) with evidence from phylogenetic analyses of concatenated LSU,
SSU, ITS and TEF1 sequence data. We could not locate any type material
for this species. Furthermore, there is no molecular data generated for
the type of this species. Therefore, an epitype is designated for the
precise delineation of this taxon. A detailed morphological description
and DNA characterization with LSU, SSU, ITS and TEF1 sequence data are
provided for the epitype, obtained from Spartina culms in Eastney,
Langstone Harbour, Hampshire, UK.
